title: Awarding of contracts for buildings to be constructed at the Sri Lanka Buddhist and Pali University and the Rajarata University of Sri Lanka
decision_details: - The proposal made by the Acting Minister of City Planning, Water Supply and Higher Education, to award the contract for the construction of a five storeyed building complex for the Colombo Office of the Buddhist and Pali University of Sri Lanka to M/s KSJ Construction (Pvt.) Ltd. at No.32, Kandy Road, Kalagedihena, for a sum of Rs.252 million and the proposed Para Clinical building for the Faculty of Medicine and Allied Sciences of the Rajarata University of Sri Lanka to M/s Sunken Construction (Pvt.) Ltd. at No.295, Madampitiya Road, Colombo, for a sum of Rs.767 million, as recommended by the Standing Cabinet Appointed Procurement Committee (SCAPC), was approved by the Cabinet.
